entity.name: Hunt and Johnson's final public debate
entity.description: The Conservative leadership hopefuls are being grilled by readers of The Sun newspaper. It is the pair's last chance to debate each other in front of the general public before polls close. One of the two candidates will be named the prime minister of the UK within the next week.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@doctor_oxford Nurses seeing suspected cases given flimpsy masks at Queen Elizabeth Hospital in Greenwich. Even the cleaner was complaining when he was given two before cleaning a covid-19 room. He said, "i am going to get a proper mask".

Not good enough #BorisJohnson #COVIDー19
